data.title: Great pizza
data.text: Ordered delivery later in the evening, wasn't the fastest service. But we weren't in any hurry. Pizza was very good, the wings were very good also.

data.title: Slooooooooooow service!
data.text: This is a popular place since it's new to Lakeville and needs to be staffed more appropriately.  Where is the manager??!!  The pizza is good but I won't be back for a month to see if maybe they've gotten their act together.  Waiting an hour for a take out pizza is nuts!  This won't make it unless it's better managed. Good luck--we'd love to have you stay in town.  Train your staff and don't skimp on their hours!

data.title: Great new Pizza Joint!
data.text: Great value with their Pizza.  You can't beat their different types and variety of Pizza!  Topper sticks and dessert make it complete.

data.title: Bad service and bad delivery on top of bad pizza.
data.text:
Don't bother trying the new pizza joint in town. 
Bad service and bad delivery on top of bad pizza. 
The birthday girl in our department want to try the new pizza place.
Our location is 0.7 mile from Toppers

Ordered two pizzas at 11:12am, was promised: '45-50 minute delivery time', nothing.
Called back at 12:32pm, was promised: 'on the way, be there in 5 minutes', nothing.
Called back at 12:59pm, was promised: 'on the way/very busy/sorry'.
TWO HOURS AFTER THE ORDER, the pizzas show up: over baked, dried out, room temperature, looking worse than a grocery store cheap pizza and tasting no better. 

Birthday girl's Mom calls asking for a refund, (we would go get it, remember 0.7 mile).
Gets smart-aleck response, the whole: 'We just opened, we're busy' story and an offer to comp us one pizza on a future order, remember we bought two. 

We all decided that THERE WILL NOT BE A FUTURE ORDER EVEN FOR FREE!
That's five lost customers at one time.
Maybe we can all help them not be so busy in the future.

WRAP UP: Bad service and bad delivery on top of bad pizza.
Don't believe the excuses from management, there are no excuses for treating a customer this way and sending out a product that bad.
